Title: Adjusting Image Ratio to 3:4
Content: Adjusting an image to a 3:4 ratio is essential for platforms like Xiaohongshu, which prefer this format. To achieve this, you can use image editing software like Meitu Xiuxiu. First, open the image in the software and select the 'Adjust' or 'Crop' option. Choose the 3:4 ratio from the available presets. This adjustment may result in some parts of the image being cropped out, so ensure that the essential elements remain visible. If the image does not look appealing after cropping, you can use the 'Background' feature to add a 3:4 background and then enlarge the main image to fit within this frame. This method ensures that the image maintains its visual appeal while conforming to the required ratio. Always preview the final image to ensure it meets your standards before saving and uploading it.

Title: Importance of Text on Images
Content: Text on images plays a crucial role in user engagement on platforms like Xiaohongshu. Users often glance at the text on images rather than reading the entire post. Therefore, the text should be concise, relevant, and visually appealing. When adding text, avoid using prohibited words to prevent your content from being flagged. Use clear and attractive fonts that complement the image. You can enhance the text's visibility by adding borders or shadows. Additionally, consider the placement of the text to ensure it does not obscure important parts of the image. Experiment with different styles and placements to find what works best for your content. Remember, the goal is to make the text eye-catching and informative, encouraging users to engage with your post.

Title: Ethical Use of Image Editing Tools
Content: When using image editing tools, it is essential to adhere to ethical guidelines. Avoid using prohibited words or phrases that could result in your content being flagged or removed. Always respect intellectual property rights and ensure you have permission to use and modify images. When adding text or other elements, aim to enhance the image's appeal without misleading viewers. Transparency and honesty in your content build trust with your audience. Additionally, familiarize yourself with the platform's guidelines to avoid unintentional violations. By following ethical practices, you can create engaging and compliant content that resonates with your audience and maintains your credibility.
